text: Yabalaalikako mu ddiini ebyo bye yalaamira Nuuhu n'ebyo bye twassa ku ggwe n'ebyo byetwalamira Ibrahim ne Mussa ne Issa ebigamba nti muyimirizeewo eddiini temujawukanangamu kizitoye kubagatta ku Katonda ebintu ebirala ekyo kye mubakowoola okujja gye kiri, Katonda alondobamu oyo gwaba ayagadde nadda gyali, era alungamya okudda gyali oyo eyeemenya
